qa_pair.question: What is the name of the first collection sorted by name ASC for this workspace?
What is the workspace name and how many collections are returned by collections.list with limit 50? Answer as | collections=.
What role is assigned to the authenticated user?
What is the email domain of the authenticated user?
What is the title of the most recently updated document overall and its collection name? Answer as | .
What is the creator email for the most recently updated document overall?
What is the name of the user who last updated the most recently updated document overall?
What is the title of the most recently updated document in the first collection sorted by name ASC?
What is the title of the oldest updated document in the first collection sorted by name ASC?
For the first collection sorted by name ASC, is sharing enabled? Answer true or false.
